BG3 Oathbreaker Tips & Builds

If a Paladin is already of a higher level and breaks their Oath, all the Features and Spells from previous Paladin levels will be added retroactively once it becomes an Oathbreaker. This means that they don't lose any kind of progression by breaking the Oath while being a high-level characte
